name: Keto Diet
description: A high-fat, low-carb diet to induce ketosis, often used for weight loss.

name: Vegan Diet
description: A plant-based diet with no animal products, rich in fruits, vegetables, and grains.

name: Mediterranean Diet
description: A diet rich in fruits, vegetables, nuts, whole grains, and healthy fats like olive oil.

name: Paleo Diet
description: A diet based on foods that would have been available to our Paleolithic ancestors, such as meat, fish, fruits, and vegetables.

name: Low Carb Diet
description: A diet that reduces carbohydrate intake to promote weight loss and improve metabolic health.

name: Intermittent Fasting
description: An eating pattern that cycles between periods of fasting and eating, which may help with weight loss and metabolic health.

name: Whole30 Diet
description: A 30-day program designed to reset your body and eliminate unhealthy cravings, focusing on whole foods.

name: Gluten-Free Diet
description: A diet that excludes gluten, a protein found in wheat, barley, and rye, beneficial for those with gluten intolerance or celiac disease.

name: Bodybuilding Diet
description: A high-protein, nutrient-dense diet designed to support muscle growth, improve strength, and aid in recovery for bodybuilders.
